description.value: The character string datatype stands for text data, primarily intended for machine processing (e.g. sorting, querying, indexing, etc.) or direct display. Used for names, symbols, presentation and formal expressions. A String shall have at least one character or else have a nullFlavor.

definition.value: The character string datatype stands for text data, primarily intended for machine processing (e.g. sorting, querying, indexing, etc.) or direct display. Used for names, symbols, presentation and formal expressions. A String shall have at least one character or else have a nullFlavor.
